page_content:
# Land Development Services

__

#### Land Development Services Alert:

CONTACT INFORMATION:  Monday through Thursday, 8 a.m. - 4 p.m. and Friday, 9:15 a.m. - 4 p.m. Please note that visitors may not be added to in-person queues past 3:45 p.m. 

__

703-222-0801 TTY 711

__

LandDevelopmentServices@fairfaxcounty.gov

__

12055 Government Center Pkwy  
Fairfax, VA 22035

__

fairfaxcounty

__

Bill Hicks  
Director

# Meet With Staff

Staff are available for **walk-in customers** in Room 324 of the Herrity Building (12055 Government Center Parkway) Monday through Thursday, 8 a.m. – 4 p.m. and Friday 9:15 a.m. – 4 p.m. Please note that visitors may not be added to the in-person queue past 3:45 p.m.

Alternatively, if you would like to **schedule a meeting** to discuss a permit application or a forthcoming project in detail, you may request a meeting using one of the two forms below.

  * Request to Meet with LDS Staff
  * Request for Pre/Post Site Submission Conference



Staff are also available by **phone** though our main number **703-222-0801, TTY 711** and directly using the LDS staff directory: LDS Staff Directory | Land Development Services (fairfaxcounty.gov).

  
Need Help? Call **703-222-0801** , **TTY 711**.

Monday through Thursday from 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. and Friday from 9:15 a.m. to 4 p.m.

  * LDS Permit Library: Access guides to navigate every record type in PLUS.
  * Letters to Industry: Subscribe for LDS announcements, notices, and tech bulletins.
  * Meet With Staff: Find a staff member to help you with the permit process.
